attributes.action: Save The Historic Fun Fair At Rhyl Ocean Beach
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The end of Rhyls Ocean Beach Fun Fair is getting closer, A £85 Million purposal has been summitted for the site and it does not include keeping the funfair. This Fun fair has been around a lot longer than I have and I enjoy the fair still today, Don't let a piece of History Disappear. Help us Petition to save it.
